text: tavada ohu vanahi maha muhuda vasanga kara dunneya. numbala eyin nævum mas anubhava karanu pinisa da eyin numbala palandina abharana goda ganu pinisa da tavada ehi (rala) hana næv da numba dakinu æta. emenma ohuge bhagyaya numbala soyanu pinisa da ve. tavada (eya) numbala krtavedi viya hæki vanu pinisaya
